# === Flask ===
# AI-irrelevant files for Flask projects
# Generated by ainit.dev

# Python bytecode
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]

# Virtual environments
.venv/
venv/

# Instance folder (local config/db)
instance/

# Web assets cache
.webassets-cache/

# Lock files
poetry.lock
Pipfile.lock

# Distribution
dist/
*.egg-info/

# Coverage
.coverage
htmlcov/
.pytest_cache/

# Cache
.mypy_cache/
